name: 魏敏樺
objective:
1.First-Order Differential Equations
2.Linear Differential Equations of Second and Higher Order
3.System of Differential Equations, Phase Plane, Qualitative Methods
4.Laplace Transforms
schedule:
週次/ Week	Topics教學進度
1. Introduction
2. 1.0 First-Order Differential Equations; 1.1 Basic Concepts and Ideas
3. 1.2 Separable Differential Equations
4. 1.3 Exact Differential Equations. Integrating Factors
5. 1.4 Linear Differential Equations. Bernoulli Equation
6. 2.0 Linear Differential Equations of Second and Higher Order; 2.1 Homogeneous Linear Equations of Second Order; 2.2 Second Order Homogeneous Equations with Constant Coef
7. 2.3 Case of Complex Roots. Complex Exponential Function; 2.4 Euler-Cauchy Equation
8. 2.6 Nonhomogeneous Equations; 2.7 Solution by Undetermined Coef. Sol by Variation of Parameters
9.  Midterm Exam
10. 3. System of DE, Phase Plane, Qualitative Methods; 3.1 Vectors, Matrices, Eigenvalues
11. 3.2 Homogeneous Systems with Constant Coefficients.
12. 3.2 Homogeneous Systems with Constant Coefficients.
13. 3.3 Qualitative Methods for Nonlinear Systems; 3.4 Nonhomogeneous Linear System
14. 4. Laplace Transforms; 4.1 Laplace Transform. Inverse Transform. Linearity. Shifting
15. 4.2 Transforms of Derivatives and Integrals. DE; 4.3 Unit Step Function. 2nd Shifting Theorem, Dirac's Delta Function
16. 4.4 Differential and Integration of Transforms
17. 4.6 Partial Fractions. Differential Equations
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework		: 10% (遲交：一星期內打六折，超過一星期以零分計算)
Quizzes   	: 20% (缺席者以零分計算)
Midterm		: 30% (缺席者以零分計算)
Final Exam	: 30% (缺席者以零分計算)
Attendance	:  5% (缺席一次扣1％, 遲到15分鐘當缺席，以線上點名系統記錄為準)
Participation	:  5%（學習狀態）
materials:
Erwin Kreyszig (2006). Advanced Engineering Mathematics. 9th edt. John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
參考書目：
Peter O’Neil (1995). Advanced Engineering Mathematics. Brooks/Cole Publishing Company.
